document.title: [PS3] Mise a jour PSN du 03/11/2010
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (03/11/2010) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Offres spéciales disponibles jusqu’au 10 novembre Voodoo Dice (prix initial : 9.99€ – maintenant : 6.99€) Mahjong Tales: Ancient Wisdom – Booster Pack (prix initial : 3.99€ – maintenant : 0.99€) Cuboid : Level Editor (prix initial : 3.99€ – maintenant : 0.99€) Cuboid : Booster Pack (prix initial : 2.99€ – maintenant : 0.99€) Dissidia: Final Fantasy (prix initial : 24.99€ – maintenant : 19.99€) James Cameron’s Avatar: The Game (PSP) (prix initial : 29.99€ – maintenant : 19.99€) Alien Zombie Death! (mini) (prix initial : 2.99€ – maintenant : 1.99€) Supermarket Mania (mini) (prix initial : 4.99€ – maintenant : 2.99€) Réductions permanentes du prix Disgaea 2: Dark Hero Days : – maintenant 19.99€ Mana Khemia: Student Alliance : – maintenant 14.99€ Prinny: Can I Really Be The Hero? : – maintenant 9.99€ What Did I Do To Deserve This, My Lord!? – – maintenant 9.99€ What Did I Do To Deserve This, My Lord!? 2 – – maintenant 9.99€ Jeux téléchargeables (PS3) God of War HD (17.99€) – PEGI 18 God of War II HD (17.99€) – PEGI 18 God of War Collection HD (29.99€) – PEGI 18 Jeux en essai et en activation (PS3) Blacklight: Tango Down (12.99€) – PEGI 16 Castle Crashers (13.99€) – PEGI 16 Jeux téléchargeables (PSP) God of War: Ghost of Sparta (26.99€) – PEGI 18 Harvest Moon: Hero of Leaf Valley (29.99€) – PEGI 3 No Heroes Allowed (12.99€) – PEGI 7 ZHP: Unlosing Ranger vs. Darkdeath Evilman (29.99€) – PEGI 12 Ys Seven (24.99€) – PEGI 12 Jeu PSone (PS3 et PSP) Centipede (4.99€) – PEGI 3 Démos (PS3) Apache Air Assault – PEGI 16 John Daly’s Pro Stroke Golf – PEGI 3 Rock Band 3 – PEGI 12 Démo (PSP) Split/Second: Velocity – PEGI 7 Application (PS3) MUBI (gratuit) – PEGI 18 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) Dead Rising 2 – Ninja Skill Pack (1.99€) – PEGI 18 FIFA 11 : Ultimate Team (gratuit) – PEGI 3 Fist of the North Star: Ken’s Rage Kenshiro Original Costume (2.49€) – PEGI 18 Front Mission: Evolved – PEGI 16 Weapons Pack 01 (2.99€) Wanzer Pack 02 (3.99€) God of War III – PEGI 18 – Apollo Character Skin (0.99€) – Forgotten Warrior Character Skin (0.99€) – Dominus Character Skin (1.75€) – PEGI 7 PAIN – PEGI 16 – Creepie Pack (0.99€) – PAINamotion Pack (gratuit) Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype : The Final Chapter (4.99€) – PEGI 7 Space Invaders Infinity Gene : Bonus Stage Pack 2 (2.99€) – PEGI 3 Split/Second: Velocity – Onslaught Pack (9.99€) – PEGI 7 Sports Champions : Reverse Tee Pack (2.99€) – PEGI 12 Super Street Fighter IV : Ultra Shoryuken Pack 1 (3.99€) – PEGI 12 Tom Clancy’s H.A.W.X. 2 – PEGI 12 – Bonus Pack (gratuit) – Russian Power Pack (3.99€) DJ Hero II : Hit Makers Mix Pack (7.99€) – PEGI 12 Rock Band 3 – PEGI 12 The Doors Greatest Hits: Rock Band Edition (14.99€) – Contient les titres énumérés ci-dessous : – ‘Hello, I Love You’ (1.49€) – ‘LA Woman’ (1.49€) – ‘Light My Fire’ (1.49€) – ‘Love Her Madly’ (1.49€) – ‘Love Me Two Times’ (1.49€) – ‘Peace Frog’ (1.49€) – ‘People Are Strange’ (1.49€) – ‘Riders On The Storm’ (1.49€) – ‘Roadhouse Blues’ (1.49€) – ‘Soul Kitchen’ (1.49€) – ‘The Crystal Ship’ (1.49€) – ‘Touch Me’ (1.49€) Rock Band Network – ‘Uncivilized’ by Texas In July (1.49€) Avatars (PS3) Uncharted 2: Among Thieves – Doughnut Drake (0.25€) – Marco Polo (0.25€) – Skelzor (0.25€) – Tetram (0.25€) – Glowzor (0.25€) – Doughnut Lazarevic (0.25€) – Genghis Kahn (0.25€) – Zorskel (0.25€) – Lieutenant Draza (0.25€) – Platzor (0.25€) Soundtracks (PS3) God of War Trilogy Soundtrack (14.99€) Thèmes dynamiques (PS3) Dead Nation – Dead Man’s Hand (1.99€) Thèmes Premium (PS3) Von Chrono Themes – Lights (1.49€) – Off the Beat (1.49€) Thèmes Premium (PSP) Von Chrono Themes – Light & Shadow: Light (1.49€) – Light & Shadow: Shadow (1.49€) Wallpapers (PSP) No Heroes Allowed Wallpaper No Heroes Allowed Landscape Wallpaper Vidéos (PS3) Buzz! The Ultimate Music Quiz Trailer Beat Sketcher Trailer Invizimals: Shadow Zone Trailer Medal Of Honor TV Advert No Heroes Allowed Trailer No Heroes Allowed Launch Trailer SingStar Guitar Trailer SingStar Dance Trailer Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype The Final Chapter Trailer Videos (PSP) Buzz! The Ultimate Music Quiz Trailer No Heroes Allowed Trailer Il est juste évident que cette semaine je vais prendre l’extension Ultimate Team de FIFA 11, car en plus d’être gratuit pour la 1ère fois cette année, il est jouable online entre amis. Pour le reste je verrai ça un tout petit peu plus tard.
